description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Arctic Ball Grind is an action packed racing game featuring rock solid physics, unique controls, and split-screen multiplayer! Drawing inspiration from snowboarding, the challenge includes mastering the control of your ball's weight as you carve around corners and tackle huge airs. Grind it now!
